title: Espanso Match File Schema
description: The Schema of .yml match files for text expansions for the open source program Espanso (see https://Espanso.org)

imports.description: A feature which allows users to import a list of matches from other files, located outside of their standard configuration folder. See more info at https://Espanso.org/docs/matches/organizing-matches/#imports.

items.description: Path to a YAML format Espanso configuration file or package.

extra_includes.description: Similar to imports, this is a feature which loads matches from files. Specifically, this loads configuration files which extend existing file functionality. It is useful to add functionality to a base configuration for an app. See https://Espanso.org/docs/matches/organizing-matches/#using-imports-to-group-private-match-sets-advanced.

items.description: Path to a YAML format Espanso configuration file or package.

extra_excludes.description: This feature is used to disable configuration files or packages when using a specific application.  See https://Espanso.org/docs/configuration/include-and-exclude/#excluding-a-package.

items.description: Path to a YAML format Espanso configuration file or package.
